description: Try our easy to follow Easy Lamb Pie With Cauliflower Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb pie,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,High protein,Soy free,Mince,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Easy Lamb Pie With Cauliflower Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook cauliflower and potato in a large steamer over a saucepan of boiling water for 15 minutes or until tender. Transfer to a bowl. Mash until almost smooth. Stir in 1/3 cup parmesan. Season. Cover to keep warm.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook lamb and garlic, breaking up with a spoon, for 6-8 minutes or until browned.

Add onion and carrot, and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add tomato paste and flour, and cook, stirring, for 1 minute. Add stock, sauce and peas. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 3 minutes or until thickened. Stir in parsley. Season to taste. Transfer mince mixture to a 6-cup capacity ovenproof dish.
Preheat grill on high. Evenly spread mash over mince mixture. Spray with oil. Sprinkle over remaining cheese. Place under grill for 5 minutes or until browned and bubbling. Serve.
